```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```

```{r}
library("leaflet")
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat= 41.8781, lng= 87.6298,
             popup="Chicago")
my_map

```
